Subclasses of BeanBuilder in grails.spring
 class WebBeanBuilder
          Extended version of the BeanBuilder class that provides support for constructing WebApplicationContext instances
 

Methods in grails.spring that return BeanBuilder
 BeanBuilder BeanBuilder.beans(groovy.lang.Closure c)
          Defines a set of beans for the given block or closure.
protected  BeanBuilder BeanBuilder.invokeBeanDefiningClosure(groovy.lang.Closure callable)
          When an methods argument is only a closure it is a set of bean definitions
